channel.title: Jobs via Hire Resolve
channel.description: A list of the jobs that Hire Resolve currently has on offer.

item.title: Senior PHP Developer - Johannesburg
item.description:
We have an amazing opportunity for a Senior PHP Developer in Johannesburg!
We require a candidate with: • BSc. Computer Sciences or National Diploma in IT • 10+ years of experience in PHP (Laravel or Symfony) and JavaScript • Extensive Linux and Laravel experience • Knowledge of MySQL, VueJS, DevOps and TDD
Should you meet the requirements for this position, please email your CV to Samantha at it.vacancy@stand-outstaffing.co.za. You can also contact Samantha on 031 350 4019 or alternatively you can visit our website www.stand-outstaffing.co.za
Should you not hear from us within 3 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.

item.title: Senior Data Analyst - Cape Town
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Data Analyst to join one of our Financial Services clients. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing complex data sets and providing valuable insights to inform our business decisions. You will be expected to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to identify trends, build predictive models, and develop data-driven solutions.
Responsibilities:
Analyze large, complex data sets to extract valuable insights and inform business decisions. Develop and maintain predictive models using statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business problems and provide data-driven solutions. Communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders using clear and concise language. Continuously monitor data quality and proactively identify and address data issues. Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies and apply them to your work.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, etc.). 5+ years of experience in data analysis, preferably in a financial services setting. Strong analytical skills with experience working with large, complex data sets. Proficiency in statistical analysis and machine learning techniques.
If you are a highly motivated self-starter with a passion for data analysis and a proven track record of delivering valuable insights, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
The client offers a competitive compensation and benefits packages and a dynamic, fast-paced work environment Send your CV to finance.vacancy@stand-outstaffing.co.za

item.title: Model Automation Manager - Johannesburg

Coding and other technologies • Python, SQL: Must have used Python in day-to-day working environment to build models. • Git: Lack of understanding of Git would imply lack of understanding of modelling best practice. • Ideal: R, SAS • Bonus: Streamlit / R Shiny / Power BI
Work experience • 6 - 10 years modelling experience. • Practical experience in improving models. • Experience in managing at least one employee. • Consulting experience would be advantageous.

item.title: (Senior) Manager- CA-Strategic Corporate Finance - Johannesburg
item.description:
• 7 – 10 years’ experience in Assurance or Financial Services Industry. • CA(SA) is a must-have. • A thorough understanding of IFRS, from an accounting perspective. • Experience in corporate finance in a consulting environment. • RiskIntegrity™ IFRS17 software experience(preferable). • Excel – advanced experience
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES • Assist clients across Africa with the development of their IFRS 17 chart of accounts and the mapping of these accounts to the IFRS 17 quantitative disclosure notes. • Assist clients with the level of aggregation appropriate for the general ledger and disclosure. • Create the customised mapping for client’s chart of accounts to the RiskIntegrity™ IFRS17 software master accounts. • Validation of the journal postings produced by the RiskIntegrity™ IFRS17 software for various clients. • Interact and communicate with clients and the clients’ auditors. • Interact with other IFRS17 specialists including IT and Actuarial functions. • Assist clients to draft IFRS17 disclosure notes for their annual financial reports. • Assist clients to identify the new controls, reconciliations and other validations that need to be embedded into new IFRS 17 systems and processes • Customise training material for IFRS 17 accounting aspects • Train clients and their stakeholders on the accounting aspects of IFRS 17 • Testing new RiskIntegrity™ IFRS17 software releases to guide clients.

item.title: DevOps Engineer - Cape Town
item.description:
We have an amazing opportunity for a DevOps Engineer, can work remotely!
We require a candidate with: • Minimum of 3 years’ experience in a DevOps role • Design and deploy cloud infrastructure that is secure, scalable, and highly available using infrastructure as code. • Perform infrastructure cost analysis and optimizations. • Make sure all system infrastructure meets best practices, compliance, and regulatory requirements. • Monitor all hosted services. Preemptively raise concerns, troubleshoot problems, and make infrastructure changes to minimize downtime. • Standardize DevOps approaches and solutions to enable faster project inception. • Work towards automating DevOps tasks and processes as far as possible to enable the company to focus on innovation and developing better solutions. • Create containerized applications for deployment on container-orchestration systems. Administer and troubleshoot Linux and Windows-based servers. • Knowledge of what is required to configure and deploy applications built on LAMP, LEMP, Ruby on Rails and Node.JS stacks. • Setup continuous integration services to build, test and deploy new application releases to servers and app stores. • Strong knowledge of the AWS Well-Architected Framework(s) with accompanying cost analysis and forecasts • Strong knowledge of AWS services like VPC, EC2, ECS, S3, SNS, API Gateway, Route 53, Code Build, SES and SQS. • Strong knowledge of the AWS Shared Responsibility Model. • Assist with crisis management where needed while helping to conduct the root cause analysis and identifying preventative measures. • Continuously monitor security bulletins and ensure all deployed services are patched for known vulnerabilities. • Continuously researching, learning and keeping up to date with new technologies and methodologies.
Should you meet the requirements for this position, please email your CV to it.careers@goldmantech.co.za. You can also contact Daniela on 031 350 4019 or alternatively you can visit our website www.goldmantech.co.za

item.title: Team Leader- Advanced Business Analytics - Johannesburg
item.description:
Our client is looking for a motivated, creative and technical person with a talent for leadership and an aptitude for business to join their consulting team in the role of Team Leader for their Advanced Business Analytics focus area. The focus of this position is to lead a small technical team of highly skilled individuals as you partner with their clients to solve problems with the application of data science, software engineering and classical business analytics. Consultants acting in this role will work with their team to understand and define client problems and develop solutions to solve them. Solutions you develop will typically include the development of software applications and machine learning or statistical models that result in recommendations and actionable insights. You and your team will communicate these insights back to the client with the use of reports and visualizations. The nature of the work requires that you are primarily based at their offices in Johannesburg or at their client’s premises, however international travel in support clients in Africa may be necessary a few times a year. Responsibilities • Lead a team of data scientists, software developers and business analysts. • Lead projects and mentor team members in project leadership. • Sustain and grow existing projects with the help of your team. • Identify and assist in winning new projects with existing and new clients in the business analytics space. • Contribute to company strategy. • Build relationships with our clients in support of growing our contracts with them and meeting their needs. • Work with our clients to explore and define their requirements. • Mentor and advise your team on appropriate methodology and techniques for developing models, frameworks and performing analysis for project work. • Research and develop analyses, models and reports supporting a variety of client requirements. • Present and support your team in presenting models, insights and recommendations in person or via video conferencing and telecommunication systems. Education and experience: • A graduate degree with a strong background in mathematics, applied mathematics, statistics or engineering. • A post graduate degree in which you have applied Machine Learning techniques. • 4+ years of programming experience in MATLAB / Python or a similar language. • 2+ years of leadership experience. • Experience with project management. • Management experience is a plus.
Characteristics: • Strong leadership skills and an interest in developing and mentoring your team. • Self-driven with the ability to take initiative and make things happen. • The ability to see the “big picture” and translate it into practical actions by diving into the technical work to achieve the client’s goals. • Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to see issues from different perspectives. • Strong knowledge and interest in artificial intelligence, machine learning, predictive modelling, data analytics, data visualization and data interpretation. • The ability to extract and communicate data insights is essential. • The ability to think creatively and solve new problems with limited resources is critical for success. • Strong communication skills and the confidence and ability to present effectively across different levels of seniority. • The ability to communicate with people from different technical domains (IT, engineering, finance) as well as marketing specialists and business managers. • High attention to detail. • The ability to perform under pressure
Should you meet the requirements for this position, please email your CV to it.careers@goldmantech.co.za. You can also contact Brooke on 031 350 4019 or alternatively you can visit our website www.goldmantech.co.za
Should you not hear from us within 3 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.
